00011 function circle(phobj,xc,yc,d,line,points)
00012 
00013 if nargin==4
00014     line = '-k';
00015     points = 'k';
00016 end
00017 
00018 a=0:pi/90:2*pi;
00019 r=d/2;
00020 [x y] = pol2cart(a,r);
00021 x = x + xc;
00022 y = y + yc;
00023 
00024 hold on;
00025 plot(x,y,line,x,y,points);
00026 hold off;
